name: Unit Trusts
shortDescription: Unit Trusts is a diversified, professionally managed portfolio of assets by investing a modest amount of money
salesHighlights: A wide range of funds offered by a top-ranked manager
The average investor does not usually have the necessary time, resources and expertise to manage their own money
Our select investment managers act as responsible stewards of your hard-earned savings
Save for a specific goal or time period, but have easy access to your money
In the event of an emergency, you can access your savings in 48 hours
Invest in either by debit order or with a lump sum
